head.title: The Direct Project: Stock Assembly Installer UI

section.name: Overview
section.p: The stock deployment is an Java assembly based on the Java Reference Implementation Bare Metal project. It consists of pre-assembled and partly configured instances of core reference implementation components. This package contains a GUI based installation application to deploy the reference implementation. Full details can be found in the users guide.

The Java Reference Implementation and Bare Metal projects are not intended to be full blown, production ready HISP. Instead it is a starting point from which a production HISP can be derived and deployed.
